==Profile==
<!-- Detailed story/lore information goes here. -->
Hajanad is a determined alchemist who strives to explore the full potential of alchemy, so that she can prove her worth to others and live a better life.

===Appearance===
<!-- Keep appearance section short and concise. Limit to 2 paragraphs with 3-4 sentences each. -->
Hajanad wears the typical attire of a female student in [[Spantamad]]. She is of average height and build with brown eyes and fair skin. She has straight brown hair that is cut in a bob with a fringe that covers her forehead.

==Event Dialogue==
===Tablet Analytics===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Hajanad:''' Go forth and try out the Remelting Device! Discover the Remelting Tablets' potential through countless battles!
:'''Hajanad:''' I've entrusted my academic career to you... and I will wait for good news from you right here!
{{Dialogue End}}

===Brewing Developments===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Hajanad:''' The Shock-Boiling Device is a new and very sturdy model, capable of withstanding high usage. It even comes with its own recording functionality...
:'''Hajanad:''' How did you find it?
:{{DIcon}} I have to agree with you. It is very potent.
::'''Hajanad:''' Exactly, right! Hahaha! Once you give me your official feedback, I'll make some more refinements and write my final report. Even my mentor will be left speechless, I just know it!
:{{DIcon}} I'll give it another go. Let's see where we go.
::'''Hajanad:''' Oh, I can sense your passion beneath your stoic tone, don't you worry! Let's do our best to create ever greater alchemical potions!
{{Dialogue End}}
